entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
